name: AudioRush (Buttermilch)
description:
This is a 3D music game. 

You'll hover on a three laned road with blocks and sliders.
The concept is easy: Hit the colored blocks and avoid the gray ones.

The game uses mp3, wav or ogg files to generate the levels.

Basic Information:

  • It can take up to 15 seconds to fully load everything. Depends on the file size.
    • gets much less when you play the same song again 
  • There are currently 3 difficulty settings. Easy, normal and hard.

Settings:

  • Save audio data: Will create a binary file in the game folder which contains the audio data. Basically a beat map.
  • Save scores: Will create a binary file in the game folder for every difficulty.
  • Discord display: Will show the song you are currently playing in your discord status.
  • Snap to mid: Will switch between the 2 movement mechanics.

Files are located here: C:\Users\\AppData\LocalLow\Buttermilch\AudioRush

Controls:

  • ESC - Pauses and unpauses the game
  • Left arrow / A - Move left
  •  Right arrow / D - Move right

If snap to mid is enabled, you will snap back to the mid lane when no button was pressed. If snap to mid is disabled, you can choose your own buttons for each lane.

Gameplay:

  • Left number stands for the hits you've made in a row
  • Middle number is your score.
  • Right number is a multiplier in percent which increases your score.

I'd be very happy about some feedback! :)
